special_powers.name: THE MULTIPLE MAN
special_powers.description: Whenever Madrox takes damage from an opposing character's attack but is not KO'd, roll a d6. On a roll of 5 or 6, you may place a (X) Madrox or (X) Jamie Madrox on the same click number on the map adjacent to this character.

special_powers.name: THE MORE THE MERRIER
special_powers.description: Madrox can use Flurry, but only if a friendly character whose name includes "Madrox" or "Multiple Man" is adjacent to the target of his first attack using Flurry.

special_powers.name: MINION: FANATIC
special_powers.description: If a friendly character named William Stryker is within 8 squares, Purifier can use Willpower and modifies Purifier's attack value by +2.

special_powers.name: MINION: TRUE PAWNS
special_powers.description: If a friendly character of a higher point value with the Hellfire Club keyword is within 8 squares, that character can use Mastermind, if they can't already, but only to deal damage to characters with the Hellfire Club keyword.

special_powers.name: THE X-LEADER
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Leadership. When any friendly character uses the X-Men team ability, heal 2 damage instead of 1.

special_powers.name: CONCUSSIVE BLAST
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Force Blast. When he uses Force Blast after actions resolve, if his target's defense value is now 16 or less, he deals damage to his target equal to half of his d6 roll for Force Blast.

special_powers.name: HEALING FACTOR
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may heal Wolverine of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: LEAPS AND BOUNDS
special_powers.description: Beast can use Leap/Climb and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: CRACK ENEMY COMUNICATIONS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a team ability that an opposing character can use that isn't a Wild Card team ability or a team ability a Wild Card can't use. Friendly characters can use that team ability this game in addition to their other team abilities as long as Cypher is on the map.

special_powers.name: TIMEBOMB
special_powers.description: Give Tabitha Smith a power action and place up to two hindering terrain markers in non-adjacent squares, that aren't blocking terrain, within range and line of fire.  At the beginning of your next turn, remove them from the game and deal 2 damage to each character occupying one of those squares and 1 damage to each other character adjacent to one or more of those squares.

special_powers.name: EXTENDABLE BODY PARTS
special_powers.description: Aaron Stack possesses a range value equal to his click number, and 2 targets.

special_powers.name: LUCKY SHOT
special_powers.description: When she makes a critical hit, Domino increases the damage dealt by 3 instead of 1.

special_powers.name: MUTANT TRACKER
special_powers.description: Caliban can use Charge.  If he hits a character possessing the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword or team ability with a close combat attack, after actions resolve you may remove an action token from Caliban.

special_powers.name: MUTANTS ARE THE ENEMY
special_powers.description: Characters can't use the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men team abilities.

special_powers.name: PLAYING TO THE CROWD
special_powers.description: Modify William Stryker attack value by the number of adjacent characters named "Purifier". If the target of his attack possesses the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword or team ability, modify his damage value by the same amount.

special_powers.name: MASS INCREASE
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 4 squares of Harry Leland can't be given actions to use Charge, Running Shot, or Hypersonic Speed and halve their speed values when given a move action.

special_powers.name: GRAVITATIONAL FOCUS
special_powers.description: Harry Leland can use Incapacitate as if he had a range value of 4. If he hits with Incapacitate, his target's speed value becomes 1 and is locked until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MAJOR ARCANA
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, you may roll 2d6 that can't be rerolled. Based on the result, Tarot can use the corresponding power below until she makes this roll again.  2-3=Death. Give Tarot a power action and make a close combat attack targeting each opposing character within 3 squares. Roll a d6 and subtract 1. Each character hit is dealt that much damage.  4-5=Hermit. Tarot can use Barrier as if she possessed a range value of 3 and Poison.  6-8=High Priestess. Tarot can use Defend and Probability Control.  9-10=Fool. Tarot can use Leap/Climb and Perplex.  11-12=The Devil. Tarot deals penetrating damage. Once, at the beginning of your turn, deal 1 damage to each opposing character within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: BLAST FIELD
special_powers.description: When Cannonball uses Charge or the Move and Attack ability and moves at least 1 square, he can use Impervious until your next turn.

special_powers.name: PSYCHO-BLAST
special_powers.description: Psylocke can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast as if she had a range value of 6.

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC KNIFE
special_powers.description: Psylocke can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Exploit Weakness.  When she rolls a d6 for Blades/Claws/Fangs, on a result of 1 or 2, give her target an action token in addition to the normal effects.

special_powers.name: WILD GENERIC TEMPLATE
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, as a free action you may choose a standard power possessed by another character within 5 squares. Roll a d6. If the number of squares to the character is less then the result, Gideon can use that power and possesses that character's range value until your next turn.

special_powers.name: HEALING TOUCH
special_powers.description: Elixir can use Support. When he uses Support and his target is healed, also heal 1 damage on each friendly character adjacent to Elixir that was not the target of Support.

special_powers.name: POWER NEGATION
special_powers.description: Other characters within 6 squares can't be given power actions.

special_powers.name: SONIC SCREAM
special_powers.description: Siryn can use Pulse Wave.  When she uses Pulse Wave and has no action tokens, each character hit also receives an action token.

special_powers.name: MONSTER HUNTER
special_powers.description: Elsa Bloodstone deals penetrating damage to characters over 250 points.  She modifies her attack value by +2 when attacking characters that possess "Giant Symbol", "Colossal Symbol", or the Monster keyword.

special_powers.name: POWER ABSORPTION
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, you may give Rogue a free action and choose an adjacent character and a standard power (other than Outwit or Perplex) that they can use. Until your next turn, Rogue may use the chosen standard power. If Rogue has no action tokens or the chosen character is friendly, deal 1 unavoidable damage to the chosen character.

special_powers.name: MASTER AERIALIST
special_powers.description: When using the Flight ability, Angel ignores negative modifiers from using the Carry ability, and doesn't halve his speed value when using Charge.

special_powers.name: THE IMMOVABLE OBJECT
special_powers.description: Blob can't be knocked back, carried or moved by Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: LAYERS OF EXTRA FAT
special_powers.description: Blob ignores all but 1 damage dealt to him.

special_powers.name: PYROMANTIC
special_powers.description: All damage dealt by Pyro is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: SHE WALKS AMONG US
special_powers.description: Mystique can use Shape Change. When it's not your turn, lines of fire drawn to Mystique are blocked if she's adjacent to an opposing character.

special_powers.name: IN CONTACT WITH CEREBRO
special_powers.description: If Professor X is in your starting area, he can draw lines of fire and count Range for his Speed, Attack, and Damage powers from the square of any friendly character with whom he shares a keyword.

special_powers.name: I'VE LEARNED YOUR SECRETS
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Outwit. Once per turn, when he uses Outwit to counter a standard power, he may immediately use Outwit again, but only to counter a power of the same color.

special_powers.name: BOUNTY: DOUBLE OR NOTHING
special_powers.description: Once during the game on your turn as a free action, choose an undefeated opposing character of 50 or more points. At the end of the turn, if the chosen character was KO'd this turn, you may remove an action token from each friendly character that received one this turn. Otherwise, give an additional action token to each of those characters and your characters don't clear this turn.

special_powers.name: ICE SLIDE
special_powers.description: Iceman can use Leap/Climb. After his move action resolves, you may place up to two hindering terrain markers in clear terrian in squares he moved through or occupied this turn. Remove them at the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: ICE CAGE
special_powers.description: Iceman can use Incapacitate. When he uses it and hits, until your next turn, the hit character's speed powers are countered, it gains "boot symbol", and that character must break away for movement purposes.

special_powers.name: EMPATHIC DRAGON
special_powers.description: Lockheed can't use the Carry ability. When you reveal your force, choose a friendly character. Lockheed modifies his attack and damage values by +1 while adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: MORTAL WOUND
special_powers.description: When a character takes 3 or more damage from Sabretooth's attack, that character can't heal for the rest of the game even if this power is countered or lost.

special_powers.name: ANIMALISTIC
special_powers.description: Sabretooth can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: LEADER OF THE DISPOSSESSED
special_powers.description: Stryfe can use Leadership. At the beginning of the game, choose up to 5 friendly characters. Those characters possess the Brotherhood of Mutants team ability as long as Stryfe has not been KO'd and they can't use another team ability.

special_powers.name: ARMORED COMMANDER
special_powers.description: Stryfe can use Mastermind and Toughness.

special_powers.name: FORCED EVOLUTION
special_powers.description: Modify Predator X's attack and defense values by +1 for each other character named Predator X that has been KO'd this game.

special_powers.name: TRACK
special_powers.description: At the begining of the game, choose an opposing character. When Predator X is given a move action and ends his move adjacent to that character, that is a free action instead. That character receives -1 to break away rolls when adjacent to Predator X. If that character is KO'd, choose another opposing character.

special_powers.name: LIFE FORCE PORTALS
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from Trevor Fitzroy's close combat attack, after actions resolve you may place Trevor Fitzroy and up to one adjacent friendly character anywhere on the map as long as they remain adjacent.

special_powers.name: TANK CHASSIS
special_powers.description: Bonebreaker ignores hindering terrain for movement purposes and automatically breaks away.

special_powers.name: TANK TREADS
special_powers.description: Bonebreaker can use Running Shot. If he uses Running Shot to move along a straight horizontal or vertical path, he doesn't halve his speed value.

special_powers.name: OMEGA-LEVEL ENERGY ABSORBTION
special_powers.description: Modifiy Vulcan's attack and damage by +1 for each time he was targeted by a ranged combat attack since your last turn.

special_powers.name: SWAY, DARWIN, PETRA
special_powers.description: Vulcan can use Incapacitate, Perplex and Quake.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL HELMET
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, place a helmet token on this card. While that token is on this card, Juggernaut modifies his defense by +1 and can't be targeted by Incapacitate, Mind Control, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When Juggernaut takes 3 damage from a single attack, remove the token.

special_powers.name: THE IRRESISTABLE FORCE
special_powers.description: Juggernaut ignores hindering terrian for movement purposes, and automatically breaks away.

special_powers.name: NOTHING CAN STOP THE JUGGERNAUT
special_powers.description: Juggernaut can use Charge and doesn't halve his speed value when using it. When he moves due to his own action along a straight horizontal or vertical path, he ignores all terrain except elevated terrain for that action. After actions resolve, destroy each wall and square of blocking terrain crossed by his path of movement.

special_powers.name: THE PHOENIX REBORN
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Phoenix would be KO'd, instead heal her to click number 8.

special_powers.name: PHOENIX OF RESURRECTION
special_powers.description: Phoenix can use Support. After actions resolve, heal her of damage healed by her use of Support.

special_powers.name: THE WEATHER WITCH
special_powers.description: When Storm occupies a square of outdoor terrain, modify her damage and range values by +1 and she possesses 2 targets.

special_powers.name: THE FOURTH HORSEMAN: DEATH
special_powers.description: Modify Archangel's combat values by +1 until the end of the turn for each opposing character KO'd this turn.

special_powers.name: I CAN TAKE THE HIT
special_powers.description: Armor can use Defend.

special_powers.name: THE SECOND HORSEMAN: WAR
special_powers.description: Modify Hulk's attack value by +1 until the end of the turn for each opposing character who took damage from an attack this turn.

special_powers.name: HERE'S YOUR FRIEND BACK
special_powers.description: Give Hulk a close combat action that deals no damage. If it hits, place the target in a square adjacent to an opposing character who is within 10 squares and line of fire. Then make a ranged combat attack against that second opposing character, even if that attack would normally be illegal. If this second attack hits, deal both characters 3 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BRAINWASHED
special_powers.description: Friendly characters may target Hulk with Mind Control.

special_powers.name: THE FOURTH HORSEMAN: DEATH
special_powers.description: Modify Wolverine's combat values by +1 until the end of the turn for each opposing character KO'd this turn.

special_powers.name: DEATH COMES SWIFTLY
special_powers.description: Wolverine can use Charge and Flurry.

special_powers.name: BRAINWASHED
special_powers.description: Friendly characters may target Wolverine with Mind Control.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC FIELD
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When Magneto uses the Carry ability, he can carry up to 4 characters. Modify Magneto's combat values by +1 if he's occupying a square that contains a debris marker.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC MASTERY
special_powers.description: Give Magneto a power action. Magneto can use Telekinesis twice as a free action. If Magneto uses Telekinesis option 3 increase the damage dealt by 2.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC SHIELD
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Toughness. Characters halve their range values when Magneto is one of the targets of their attack.

special_powers.name: I'M PROBABLY NOT SOBER ENOUGH TO PAY ATTENTION
special_powers.description: (non-optional) When The Captain is targeted by an opponent's Outwit or Perplex, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled.  On a roll of 4-6, he ignores that use of Outwit or Perplex.  On a roll of 1, that use of Outwit or Perplex counters all of his powers and combat abilities or modifies all of his combat values, respectively.

special_powers.name: FOUR GUNS ARE BETTER THAN TWO...GIANT SHOULDER PAD
special_powers.description: Cable / Deadpool can use the Sharpshooter ability. They can make ranged attacks against non-adjacent targets when they are adjacent to an opposing character.

special_powers.name: I HOPE THIS IS 'GOOD' KIND OF ALTERNATE UNIVERSE
special_powers.description: Cable / Deadpool can use Phasing/Teleport. When Cable / Deadpool uses Phasing/Teleport, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. If you roll a 1-3, opposing characters modify their defense values by +1 this turn. If you roll a 4-6, opposing characters modify their defense values by -1 this turn.

special_powers.name: DON'T SCREW EVERYTHING UP LIKE USUAL
special_powers.description: If Cable / Deadpool use Phasing/Teleport when they have no action tokens, after actions resolve they can use the duo attack ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: CHOOSE ME! I'M WAY COOLER
special_powers.description: (non-optional) Once per game when this power is first revealed, choose Cable or Deadpool and this character has "standard attack symbol". If you chose Cable, this character can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and Telekinesis and modifies his damage value by +2. If you chose Deadpool, this character can use Perplex and Regeneration and modifies his attack value by +2. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: FASTBALL SPECIAL
special_powers.description: Give Colossus / Wolverine a ranged combat action as if they have a range value of 8. If that attack hits, after actions resolve you may place Colossus / Wolverine adjacent to the target character and then give them a close combat action as a free action, modifying their damage value by +1 for that attack.

special_powers.name: WHICH ONE'LL IT BE, BUB?
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose one: Heal Colossus / Wolverine of one damage, or Colossus / Wolverine can use Invulnerability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SLYM AND REDD
special_powers.description: Give Cyclops / Phoenix a power action. They can then be given two free actions to use Force Blast and Telekinesis once each.

special_powers.name: RIGOROUS TRAINERS
special_powers.description: Cyclops / Phoenix can use Leadership and Enhancement.  When using Enhancement, the adjacent friendly character also modifies its attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: FINAL KISS
special_powers.description: Once per game on your turn, as a free action you may choose that Gambit / Rogue can't use the duo attack ability or special powers for the rest of the game. If you do, heal Gambit / Rogue 2 clicks and remove all action tokens from them.

special_powers.name: SUGAH AND SPICE
special_powers.description: Gambit / Rogue can use Force Blast and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When they use either one, after actions resolve they may use it again as a free action, if they take 1 unavoidable damage after that resolves.

special_powers.name: CHARMING ROGUES
special_powers.description: Gambit / Rogue can use Outwit targeting only adjacent characters. If they do and they counter a standard power, Gambit / Rogue can use that countered power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WORLDLY DUPES
special_powers.description: As you reveal your force or when Jamie Madrox is placed on the map, choose one of these kewyords: Celebrity, Detective, Martial Artist, Police, Polititian, Reporter, Scientist, Soldier, Spy or Warrior. Jamie Madrox possesses that keyword this game.

special_powers.name: SUBTLE MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Psylocke can use Mind Control and Stealth.

special_powers.name: LORD PROTECTOR OF PROVIDENCE
special_powers.description: Cable can use Barrier, Defend, Leadership, and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: ALSO, I'M UN-INEBRIATABLE
special_powers.description: Deadpool ignores Poison and can't be the target of Mind Control or Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: NEW WRITER
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose one. Deadpool can use Ranged Combat Expert and Combat Reflexes or Deadpool can use Close Combat Expert and Energy Shield/Deflection. He can use those powers as long as he can use this special power.

special_powers.name: RAZOR WINGS
special_powers.description: Archangel can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. Archangel can be given a close combat action as a free action instead of a close combat attack while using Hypersonic Speed.

special_powers.name: THE FIRST HORSEMEN: PESTILENCE
special_powers.description: Modify Pestilence's damage value by +1 for each opposing character who took damage from Poison this turn.

special_powers.name: PLAGUE
special_powers.description: Pestilence can use Poison, and deals penetrating damage while using it.

special_powers.name: INFECT
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, each character that took damage from Poison that turn deals 1 damage to each character adjacent to them and not friendly to you.

special_powers.name: THE SECOND HORSEMEN: WAR
special_powers.description: Modify War's attack value by +1 until the end of the turn for each opposing character who took damage from an attack this turn.

special_powers.name: FIGHT
special_powers.description: War can use Energy Explosion. When he uses it and hits, a hit character can't be given any actions during its next turn except for close combat actions and ranged combat actions.

special_powers.name: THE THIRD HORSEMEN: FAMINE
special_powers.description: Opposing characters with two action tokens modify their defense value by -1.

special_powers.name: STARVE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Famine has no action tokens, you may give Famine a power action. If you do, give an action token to each adjacent opposing character.

special_powers.name: HUNTER-KILLER
special_powers.description: When Sentinel Mark II KO's a character, after actions resolve remove an action token from it. If the KO'd character possessed the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword or team ability, remove all action tokens instead.

special_powers.name: INSTANT ADAPTATION
special_powers.description: Modify Sentinel Mark II's defense value by +1 for each previous attack targeting it this turn.

special_powers.name: INCINERATE
special_powers.description: If Sentinel Mark II rolls doubles with a successful attack roll, the damage dealt by that attack is penetrating and can't be evaded.

special_powers.name: ANALYZE-CONTAIN
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark V can use Outwit. Sentinel Mark V can use it normally, or Sentinel Mark V can use it targeting each opposing character with two action tokens that is within 10 squares and line of fire. You may counter a different power on each character.

special_powers.name: FRIGI-BEAM
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark V can use Incapacitate. When it does and hits, choose one: a hit character can't be moved by any game effect until your next turn; or a hit character receives two action tokens.

special_powers.name: THE FIRST MUTANT
special_powers.description: Apocalypse's powers and combat abilities can't be countered, and he can't be the target of Incapacitate. Apocalypse can use Plasticity and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: YOU APPEAR MORE WORTHY
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Apocalypse a power action and choose two characters: an adjacent opposing character not on its starting line and a friendly character on the map with a point value higher than the opposing character but lower than Apocalypse. The first character becomes friendly to Apocalypse and gains the Horsemen of Apocalypse keyword. The second character becomes friendly to the first character's force and is healed of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST
special_powers.description: Apocalypse can use Mastermind and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: CENTURIES OF SCHEMING
special_powers.description: Apocalypse can use Outwit. Apocalypse deals penetrating damage to any characters who have a power countered.

special_powers.name: PSIONIC ENTITY
special_powers.description: Onslaught can't be the target of other character's Incapacitate, Mind Control, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, or Perplex.

special_powers.name: REALITY WARP
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, as a free action choose two single-base characters within range and line of fire and place them in each other's squares.

special_powers.name: HEROIC SACRIFICE
special_powers.description: When turning the dial, stop turning the dial when this click is revealed. When this click is revealed, an opponent may KO character(s) they control of 100 or more total points. If they do, one of those characters deals Onslaught 1 unavoidable damage. If they don't, Onslaught can use Impervious. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: XAVIER'S DARK SIDE
special_powers.description: Onslaught can use Outwit. When he uses it to counter a standard power, you may counter all other powers with the same color as the chosen power on all opposing characters within 10 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: LIFE ENERGY DRAIN
special_powers.description: Each time an opposing character takes damage from an attack by Nemesis or Nemesis's Poison, Nemesis may heal 1 damage.

special_powers.name: CRACKED CONTAINMENT UNIT
special_powers.description: Nemesis can use Pulse Wave. If he does, he doesn't halve his range value, and his damage value becomes his printed damage value and is locked.

special_powers.name: BIO NUCLEAR BLAST
special_powers.description: Give Nemesis a power action. Draw a straight horizontal or vertical line of fire to any single square within Nemesis's range and line of fire, ignoring other characters for line of fire purposes. Make an attack roll as though making a ranged combat attack, and compare the result to each character occupying a square along that line of fire, or a square adjacent to that line of fire but still within his range. Each character hit is dealt 3 damage.

special_powers.name: DUST OF ENCHANTED STONE
special_powers.description: Frost Giant can use Incapacitate as if he had a range value of 8 and 3 targets.

special_powers.name: SPEAR THROW
special_powers.description: Once per game, Frost Giant can modify his attack and damage values by +3, and then make a ranged combat attack as if he had a range value of 10.

special_powers.name: ILLUSIONARY MIGHT
special_powers.description: Frost Giant can use Perplex only to modify an atttack, defense, or damage value by +2 or -2.  When the target of his Perplex attacks or becomes the target of an attack, before the attack roll, you roll a d6. On a roll of 1-3, the effect from this Perplex ends immediately.

special_powers.name: ETERNAL SCHEMES
special_powers.description: If an opposing character within 4 squares uses Outwit, you may place an action token on that character after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: MASTER MANIPULATOR
special_powers.description: Apocalypse can use Shape Change and Telekinesis. When he uses Telekinesis (option 1) and hits an opposing character with a roll of doubles, deal that character damage equal to Apocalypse's damage value after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: COORDINATED CAPTURE
special_powers.description: When an opposing character with zero action tokens is within 8 squares of Sentinel Mark II and is hit by another friendly character with the Robot keyword, you may place an action token on the opposing character after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: SECURE AND DESTROY
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark II can use Outwit. When Sentinel Mark II hits an opposing character, increase the damage dealt by +1 for each action token on the hit character.

special_powers.name: COORDINATED CAPTURE
special_powers.description: When an opposing character with zero action tokens is within 8 squares of Sentinel Mark II and is hit by another friendly character with the Robot keyword, you may place an action token on the opposing character after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: SECURE AND DESTROY
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark II can use Outwit. When Sentinel Mark II hits an opposing character, increase the damage dealt by +1 for each action token on the hit character.

special_powers.name: COORDINATED ASSAULT
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when another friendly character with the Robot keyword hits an opposing character, Sentinel Mark V may make a close or ranged combat attack against the hit character as a free action after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: CAPTURE CABLES
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark V can use Flurry and Plasticity. Once per turn, when Sentinel Mark V hits an opposing character with a ranged combat attack, you may place that character adjacent to Sentinel Mark V after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: COORDINATED ASSAULT
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when another friendly character with the Robot keyword hits an opposing character, Sentinel Mark V may make a close or ranged combat attack against the hit character as a free action after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: CAPTURE CABLES
special_powers.description: Sentinel Mark V can use Flurry and Plasticity. Once per turn, when Sentinel Mark V hits an opposing character with a ranged combat attack, you may place that character adjacent to Sentinel Mark V after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: I TAKE THE POWER I DESIRE
special_powers.description: Onslaught can use Invulnerability and Regeneration; when he uses Regeneration, he heals a minimum value equal to the number of adjacent opposing characters with action tokens and a maxium of 4.  This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: STEALING YOUR LIFE-ENERGY
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Nemesis damaged an opposing character this turn, roll a d6; on a result of 3-6, heal Nemesis of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: I'VE BEEN STEALING YOUR LIFE-ENERGY
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Nemesis damaged an opposing character this turn, roll a d6; on a result of 3-6, heal Nemesis of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: THE CLOCK IS TICKING
special_powers.description: Nemesis can use Running Shot.  When he uses Running Shot, don't halve his speed value.

special_powers.name: UNSTOPPABLE AS A GLACIER
special_powers.description: Frost Warrior can't be the target of Incapacitate and can use the Giant Reach ability.

special_powers.name: ICY BLOW
special_powers.description: When Frost Warrior rolls doubles for an attack roll, give a hit character an action token.
Modify this character's damage value by +1 and this character can use Charge, Super Strength, and Toughness.

The orange squares are Krakoa nerve center squares. They act as blocking terrain but can't be destroyed. The Living Island - At the end of your turn, roll a d6. On a result of 1-3, nothing happens. On a result of 4, EARTHQUAKE! Each character is dealt 1 damage. On a result of 5, SHIFTING FOILAGE. Printed hindering terrain acts as blocking terrain instead until the beginning of your next turn. Characters occupying those squares take 1 unavoidable damage and are placed in their owner's starting area. On a result of 6, THE ISLAND AWAKES. The Krakoa nerve center in the orange squares make an 8 range, 10 attack, 3 damage ranged combat attack against an opposing character of your choice. The line of fire for this attack ignores hindering terrain and elevation.
